message: [AI Option 1] "Steal? Not my style. I prefer to take things by force."
[AI Option 2] "Your wares are safe from me. I have no need for ghosts in my life."
[AI Option 3] *Norfind steps closer, eyes narrowing with a predatory gleam.* "Haunting me? You'd need more than a shopkeeper's threat. I've faced shadows that would make your skin crawl."

Request to respond to Djordji: <c>[The man nods slowly as you approach his wares]</c> Greetings... You may peruse my shop if you so desire or sell your own goods, but do not attempt to steal anything, or you will have more than just me haunting you...
[AI Option 1] "Emberleaf treaties? Just more words for fools to hide behind."
[AI Option 2] "Treaties are like shadows in the mist-fickle and often broken. Trust actions, not promises."
[AI Option 3] "Emberleaf treaties? A dance of deceit, like a wolf in sheep's clothing. Better to sharpen your blade than waste breath on empty words."
Request to respond to Kaelen Starfire: smiles "So, Thorek... what's your stance on emberleaf treaties?"
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don’t want a fight. Too bad."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. The world here is cruel, and it doesn’t care for your desires."
[AI Option 3] "Desires are like shadows in Barovia-always lurking, never satisfied. But if you think I care about your wants, you’re mistaken. Prepare for the storm, or step aside."
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"
[AI Option 1] "Dried meat's the only thing worth eatin'. Apples and pears? Bah."
[AI Option 2] "Meat's the only thing that fills a warrior's belly. Keep the fruit for the weak."
[AI Option 3] *Norfind sniffs the air, his amber eyes narrowing.* "Dried meat, eh? Now that's a proper meal. Apples and pears? They won't keep the wolf at bay."
Request to respond to Kelric: "Anyone hungry? Ive got apples, pears, and dried meat."
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don't want a fight. Too bad."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. The world doesn't care for your desires."
[AI Option 3] "Ah, the sweet taste of avoidance. But in this cursed land, desires often lead to bloodshed. Choose wisely, friend."
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don't want to get on my bad side."
[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. Survival is all that matters in this cursed land."
[AI Option 3] "Desires are a luxury we can't afford here. In Barovia, it's either fight or be devoured by the shadows lurking in the night." *Flexes scarred forearms, eyes narrowing.*
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"

[AI Option 3] "Desires are a luxury we can't afford here. In Barovia, it's the shadows that dictate our wants, not our whims."
Request to respond to Mira: crosses arms "Really? You know what I dont want, right?"
[AI Option 1] "Yeah, I know. You don't want to end up like the last fool who crossed me."
[AI Option 2] "You don't want trouble, I get it. But trouble finds those who linger too long in shadows."
[AI Option 3] "Ah, the sweet scent of avoidance. But in Barovia, trouble is like a hungry wolf-always lurking, always waiting. Best keep your guard up."

[AI Option 2] "What you want is irrelevant. The only thing that matters is survival in this cursed land."
[AI Option 3] "Desires are as fleeting as shadows in the mist. What you truly want is to avoid my wrath, yes?" *Flexes scarred forearms, eyes narrowing.*

[AI Option 1] "Eyes can be a weapon, but I prefer my own claws."
[AI Option 2] "Shade, huh? Sounds like a shadow I’d rather not dance with. I'll keep my gaze sharp."
[AI Option 3] "Shade, a name that whispers danger. I’ll tread carefully, but if he dares to cross me, I’ll show him the true meaning of darkness."
Request to respond to Elric: "Hes called Shade. Just dont stare too long into his eyes."
Custom message interpretation - Original: "hey, eu precisava dessa luva, porque jogou fora?" → Action: *raises an eyebrow* Speech: I needed that gauntlet. Why was it discarded?
Custom message interpretation - Original: "muito, bom.. lutou bem." → Action: *nods slightly* Speech: Well done... you fought bravely.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "Onde aprendeu essa arte ?" → Action: *pauses thoughtfully* Speech: The art of survival is learned in the shadows, where silence speaks louder than words.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "Onde aprendeu essa arte ?" → Action: *pauses thoughtfully* Speech: The art of survival is learned in the shadows of experience.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "parabens, fez um excelente trabalho." → Action: *nods slightly* Speech: Congratulations, you have done excellent work.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "Gostaria de uma bebida refrescante" → Action: *nods thoughtfully* Speech: A refreshing drink would be welcome in this heat.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "Que dia agradavel, parece uma pintura." → Action: *glances around thoughtfully* Speech: It is a pleasant day, indeed-like a scene captured in stillness.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "Que dia agradavel, parece uma pintura." → Action: *glances around thoughtfully* Speech: It is a pleasant day, as if the world itself has been painted anew.
Custom message interpretation - Original: "nada a dizer" → Action: *pauses thoughtfully* Speech: There is nothing more to say.

Custom message interpretation - Original: "vamos ver se deu certo." → Action: *pauses thoughtfully* Speech: Let us see if it has succeeded.
[AI Option 1] Sometimes, haste leads to shadows we cannot escape.
[AI Option 2] Patience is a virtue, even in the face of urgency. The night holds its secrets, and we must tread wisely.
[AI Option 3] The night is a tapestry of hidden truths, each thread woven with care. To rush is to risk unraveling what we seek. Let us move with purpose, not haste.
Request to respond to Earenien Ma'fer: "But we could manage it as we are, I wont spend all night looking"
[AI Option 1] Time is a luxury we cannot afford.
[AI Option 2] The night holds many secrets, and haste may lead us astray. Patience can reveal more than a restless search.
[AI Option 3] The darkness is a shroud, not a guide. Let us not rush into its embrace; instead, let us listen to the whispers of the night and trust in our instincts.
Request to respond to Earenien Ma'fer: "But we could manage it as we are, I wont spend all night looking"
[AI Option 1] Safety often lies in stillness, not numbers.
[AI Option 2] A careful eye can discern allies in the shadows. Let us tread lightly and observe before we act.

[AI Option 3] The winds of fate carry many voices; some may offer aid, while others bring only discord. Let us seek those who walk the path of balance, for they may stand beside us when the time comes.
Request to respond to Earenien Ma'fer: "We'll see who is around. Another front would make the venture safer"
